name: The Music Caveman
description:
A minigame where the player must manage to dodge obstacles to reach the end of the level.

History: A primitive cave man meets an instrument foreign to his time and when he plays it he travels to the original time of the instrument, thus being able to know the progress of music.

Link PDF game design: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1VaoGvxsPYjKJuBKlFNfIozD68S_xSaUP/view?usp=shari...
